text: The JAC Refine RF8 is a Minivan made by JAC Motors under the JAC Refine series since 2024. == History and Features == The JAC Refine RF8 was shown at the Chengdu Auto Show in August 2023 and was launched in January 2024 its the first standalone model from the JAC Refine series and its uses the MUSE plataform JAC Motors actually plans to launch two more minivans with the MUSE plataform in 2025 or 2026. The Minivan has a 2.0 liter petrol engine and has a Plug-in hybrid version that combines a 1.5 liter petrol engine with a electric motor. == Markets == The JAC Refine RF8 is sold mainly in the Chinese market. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Minivans
title: JAC Refine RF8
